subSubSection.paragraph:
Material examined. Bulgaria
: (site 20) Kostenec (Kostenets), 2 ♂ , 15.viii.1981 , SW, brook in field, veg.:
Salix , Alnus , Rubus, Lappa
, slides Inv. No. 24972, 25372, leg., det., Ježek; (site 29) Černá River, Ribarica (Ribaritsa) env. Teteven, 1 ♂ , 17.vi.1985 , SW, river, rock, veg.:
Fagus , Mentha , Petasites , Hedera, Asplenium
, slide Inv. No. 25167, leg., det., Ježek; the same, (site 29) near Trojan ( 7 km behind), 1 ♂ , 17.vi.1985 , SW, brook in
Fagus
forest, veg.:
Corylus , Mentha , Petasites
, slide Inv. No. 25176, leg., det., Ježek; Rhodopes Mts., (site 2) Batak, 1 ♂ , 16.viii.1981 , SW, brook, waterfall, veg.:
Alnus , Corylus , Petasites ,
slide Inv. No. 25001, leg., det., Ježek; the same, (site 31) Smoljan ( Smoľan ), 1 ♂ , 18.viii.1981 , SW, brook, rock, veg.:
Carpinus , Populus ,
Salix, Musci
, slide Inv. No. 25045, leg., det., Ježek; the same, (site 9) Devin, 4 ♂ , 17.viii.1981 , SW, branches over the river,
Alnus , Salix
, slides Inv. No. 25062, 25430, 25442, 25451, leg., det., Ježek; Stara Planina Mts. range, (site 7) Černi Osjm (Cherni Osam) 3 km direction Neškovci env. Trojan, 1 ♂ , 18.vi.1985 , SW, river, veg.:
Fagus , Mentha
, Poaceae , slide Inv. No. 25281, leg., det., Ježek; the same, (sites 7, 26) Černi Osjm (Cherni Osam) x Orešak (Oreshak) env. Trojan, 1 ♂ , 19.vi.1985 , SW, brook, veg.:
Salix , Juglans, Impatiens, Urtica ,
Poaceae , slide Inv. No. 25242, leg., det., Ježek; the same, (site 10) river Elešnica (Eleshnitsa) nr. Murgaš Mt., 1 ♂ , 13.vi.1985 , SW, wet rock wall, veg.:
Carpinus, Crataegus, Urtica, Ranunculus
, slide Inv. No. 25304, leg., det., Ježek; the same, (site 13) Gradec (Gradets) env. Sliven , 1 ♂ , 23.vi.1985 , SW, brook, pasture, veg.:
Quercus , Salix, Crategus , Corylus , Rubus, Rosa, Urtica
, slide Inv. No. 25127, leg., det., Ježek; the same, (site 13) Katunišče (Katunishte) env. Sliven , 1 ♂ , 23.vi.1985 , SW, brook near river, veg.:
Prunus , Alnus , Sambucus , Rubus , Juncus
, Poaceae , slide Inv. No. 25132, leg., det., Ježek; the same, (site 13) Gradec (Gradets) env. Sliven , 1 ♂ , 23.vi.1985 , SW, brook, pasture, veg.:
Quercus , Salix, Crategus , Corylus , Rubus, Rosa, Urtica
, slide Inv. No. 25127, leg., det., Ježek; the same, (sites 23, 37) peak Murgaš (Murgash) – Vračeš (Vrachesh), 5 km from Vračeš (Vrachesh), 1 ♂ , 16.vi.1985 , SW, brook, garden, veg.:
Alnus , Salix , Corylus , Mentha
, slide Inv. No. 25223, leg., det., Ježek; the same, (site 26) Orešak (Oreshak) env. Trojan, 1 ♂ , 19.vi.1985 , SW, river, waste, veg.:
Juglans , Salix , Rubus , Petasites, Urtica, Solanum
, slide Inv. No. 25106, leg., det., Ježek; the same, (site 33) Teteven (direction cottage S. Mladenov), 1 ♂ , 16.vi.1985 , SW, brook, wet meadow, veg.:
Fagus , Juglans , Juncus, Sphagnum , Mentha
, slide Inv. No. 25188, leg., det., Ježek; the same, (site 33) Teteven, 1 ♂ , 16.vi.1985 , SW, brook, houses, gardens, waste, veg.:
